case.state: I'm all fired up! Heheh...
What is this game? I just hope it's fun.
Whatever game this is, I could use some fun!
(Who's that? She kinda looks like me... Is she cosplaying me or something?)
I'm Ret-2-Go!
I'll dance to victory! You'll see.
Shantae is Ret-2-Go!
One loss, no big deal. Let's continue!
I'll have ~cards~. Please and thank you.
I wanna say... ~cards~? Yep, ~cards~.
~cards~! No, wait... What did I say?
~cards~ sounds fine.
Would it be a bad idea to swap ~cards~ cards? We'll see...
I want ~cards~ cards, please!
Really sorry...
Sorry again.
Eh... Umm... ~Cards~ is okay.
I wasn't going for this hand, but somehow it worked out!
Oh, so that's how you get a hand like this one...
I won't let my expression betray my cards. Heheheh...
Is this hand good or not? I'm not sure... Let's pretend it is!
Oh, I like how this hand looks.
I have a good feeling about these cards!
This card is... And this other is... Oh, this is good!
Hey, are you checking out my cards to figure out how I got such a good hand? Joke's on you, cause I have no idea.
Oh, yeah! Get ready, because I got something good in store.
I wish I had gotten a hand like this one the other round. You know, the one I lost.
Hey, what's the deal with these cards? You know what...? Oh, wait... This is actually good.
No shoes, you lose! And by that I mean I don't have shoes anymore, and I'm gonna make you lose.
It seems I get to stay one more round only 80% naked. Yay...
Time to show you my moves! My, umm... card moves.
I'm ready for anything!
These cards have invincibility!
I shine the brightest when I'm in a difficult position!
It's not my turn yet, buddy.
Hurray...!
This hand is the culmination of all my poker skills, focus and luck. Mostly luck.
I think this is a good hand. Can someone tell me if it's good? Oh, but then you'd see my cards. Duh...
I don't think I made a mistake. Yet.
And that one is... Ah, I see... Am I thinking out loud? It seems so...
Is it too much to ask for the bar to be lower for a newbie?
Okay! I think I'm getting the hang of it.
This game is not so complicated. If... if I understand it right.
Is this the part when we say how good our cards are? I'm not sure...
I'll never skip the tutorial again...
I finally understand this game completely. And it only took me losing a couple of times.
Hmm, I almost got a better hand. Well, I'll take it.
Nobody said you can't use magic to cheat in this game... I wouldn't do it! But I think it's a little unsettling that it's an option.
Could've been better. But I'm not gonna cry about it.
Is there a way to win your clothes back? Like, what if you get a really good hand, huh?
I'm not sure this hand is that good. But I'll believe it is!
Nothing to do now but stand here looking pretty.
A serious hand for a serious situation.
Um... Alright. I'm so nervous... I need something to nibble besides my fingernails.
I gotta use all my concentration... This was a... Emm...
Let's see, I should... Hey, don't look at me while I'm thinking!
It's tough resisting the urge to cover my body right now, but I'll try...
Eh... I'm not sure if this hand is bad, but I have a bad feeling.
Did I say ~cards~ cards? I meant to say... Oh, shoot...
The cards with letters are worse than the ones with numbers, right? I think I'm doing well.
Even I know this hand is poopy...
Am I just naturally bad at this game?
I don't wanna say that you gave me these cards on purpose, but...
Hey, this is... good? Maybe not...
Is nobody willing to help me learn this game?
Perhaps I should just stick to fighting pirates and monsters.
Mmmph...! Just when I thought I had this thing figured out.
Meh... I'm too discouraged to get mad. This hand sucks.
Shantae, you numbskull... What did you do?
Ah... I should really take a class on how to play this game in case I end up in this situation again. Maybe Sky can teach me...?
No... But I thought if I swapped... Ahhh, I'm so stupid!
Oh, boogers...
Are you kidding me? If only I could hair whip these cards to make them better.
Okay, I can handle this... I can...
How did I get into this mess?
No, no, no...!
Oh, good gravy...
(Is his thing showing? That can't be right... I'll take a closer look and... No, it is!)
(I can't believe that girl is wearing clothes everywhere except on the important parts... What kind of fashion is this?)
(That girl's breasts are completely visible... Should I say something? I think I should say something...) Boobs! Sorry...
(That girl is not wearing pants! Could she be a mermaid who just transformed into a human? Or maybe she's just a pervert? Yeah, that's more likely.)
This game is Strip Poker? Does that mean what I think it means? I wish I'd known beforehand...
Wait, nobody told me this was Strip Poker! Is it too late to back down now? Rats...
Hmm? (Mumbling...) I don't mind dancing alone, but dancing with more people is always more fun, Komi!
Oh, I'm Shantae, by the way. Guardian Genie of Scuttle Town... Well, half genie.
I haven't introduced myself, have I? I'm Shantae. I'm Half Genie and Guardian of Scuttle Town. Nice to meet you!
My adventures are very simple. They usually involve collecting artifacts, fighting monsters, rescuing people, unlocking new transformations, etc.
Going back to what you said about dreams, Nami, my own is meeting my mom. She's a genie who is sealed in the Genie Realm. I'd love to learn more about her.
Wowza, Nami! Your booty is like a perfectly shaped pumpkin. Sigh, now I'm hungry...
Is it okay if I move my body while playing? It helps me keep my cool.
Everybody okay if I dance a little while playing? I have a hard time standing still when I'm nervous.
Map the entire world? I have a hard time finding maps of specific places in Sequin Land. That's a big task, Nami!
Do comic books count? I've been reading this one about a space cop who wants to avenge her parents death. It's so good!
Why is Komi stripping again? She doesn't have to do that now.
Was I the only one that didn't know Ping wasn't a man? Hmmm... I wonder who else has something to hide. ~Player~?
Do they really have makeup for zombies now? You gotta let me know where to get it for my friend Rottytops. I want her to see what she looks like when she's not green.
Nami's crew mates sound like nice people, despite being pirates. I'd like to meet them sometime.
Spirit? No, I'm alive!
Oh, I've explored a lot of ruins. Usually I go inside to get some artifact or another, fight every monster I find, and then a boss that explodes with a white screen. Classic.
A talking statue! Is the Hypno Baron around?
What's so cool about pirates? They always show up with their big cannons, destroy everything, call me names, and she always ignores me and treats me like a brat...
So those cubes are not weirdly shaped bees? Huh...
Ninian? That's a pretty name. I bet she's got some nice moves. Did she teach you any, Florina?
Nice to meet you! By the way, who do we have to talk to to get a spotlight on us? I'd like one if it's okay.
Doesn't ring a bell, so I don't think I know him... Unless it's one of the hundreds of creatures I've whipped with my hair.
I can't believe you're a pirate, Nami! You lied to my face, you villain! Do you work with Risky Boots too?
I've been all around Sequin Land a few times chasing pirates, collecting artifacts, defeating the personification of all evil. You know, the usual.
~Leader~, I'm coming for you! Nothing personal...
I'm gonna make ~leader~ lose next! I don't know how, but I'll figure it out!
How could I get ~leader~ to lose this round so things can get even?
Anyone else thinks ~leader~ should lose this round? Gotta keep the game balanced, right?
~Leader~ is winning by too much! It's not fair!
Pssss! Listen everyone (except ~leader~). Let's make ~leader~ lose this round.
Sometimes, but usually I just feel the rhythm. Though I could swear that sometimes I hear this very upbeat music. Especially when I'm fighting enemies.
Really...? I don't know how to take that. Thank you for saying you like my figure, I guess?
I guess I'm the same way with pirates. And people who call themselves Baron.
I know, Aella. The other day I swear I lost half a heart after I bumped my little toe on the side of a table.
HP? Of course! Mine appear as little red hearts.
(Mumbling...) Oh, Scuttle Town is the best, Komi! There's a shop, a Dance Parlor, a bathhouse... Also the people are the best, and I'm not saying that just because my friends live there.
I can be cool too, Cynthia. I just don't do it all the time except when duty calls, or when Uncle Mimic gives me permission to go explore.
I'm only half-genie, so I can't grant wishes. Unless one of your wishes is meeting a half-genie, in which case you're welcome!
(Nami looks really scary sometimes. Like a demon! Could she be...? Nah...)
I love chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I eat it straight from the tub. Mostly because I don't own dishware, but also because it's so good!
I don't think beating up your friends is very nice. Except for Bolo, but that's because his head is so thick that it'd hurt me more than him.
Brrrrr...! Why is it so cold here? We should be playing this in a well tempered room,
It's so cold here. I hate the cold. Not only because of the way I dress, that's just part of it.
What's wrong, everyone? You're feeling too hot in here? Just don't think about it.
Where's everyone's enthusiasm? Don't tell me you're feeling too hot in here? I guess not everyone likes the heat.
I don't like this place. Scuttle Town is way nicer. Also, why are we playing outside?
What's with all the weapons here? We're not gonna have to fight each other to death after the game ends, right?
I love the beach! Too bad I didn't bring my swimsuit.
Is the owner of this bedroom okay with us playing here? Shouldn't we ask for their permission first?
Why a classroom? Are we gonna have a surprise test? I didn't study!
This isn't the scariest haunted forest I've visited. Oh, I wonder if Rotty and her brothers are around!
I'd love to take a dip in this hot spring. Is that the winner's prize?
Look at all these books! It's been a while since I've read one...
If we have to undress, I suppose a locker room at least makes sense.
What a fancy place... I could probably afford a mansion like this one if I save all my earning for... 500 years. Should I ask for a raise?
I don't think I've ever been in a tower this tall! It's almost as high as an airship.
This room is so purple, I bet my hair blends with the background. Wait, does that mean I look bald?!
Hey, nobody told me we were playing outside! I'm not ready for this...
This is such a nice place. I love the decoration. And you can't beat that view!
I can't believe I made it to the end against ~player~! Ummm, good luck I guess. I'm so nervous...
It's just ~player~ and me right now? Win or lose! You know what? I'm okay with this. You were my favorite, after all.
So it's just me playing against 3 students? I hope I don't get outsmarted, heheh... heh...
This is the final round, right? Nggh, I'm so nervous! I'm not even gonna look at the cards. I'll just hope for the best.
Is this the final final round? Oh, man... I've forgotten everything I've learned! I'm screwed!
I bet this game would be more fun with more players. But three is nice too.
It's nice that there are only three players, since this is my first time playing. I don't wanna get my butt kicked too badly.
No men, huh? Oh, that's... cool. None of us wants to see men undress, right? Heheh...
Only girls? I thought there would be at least one guy here. Well, I guess it doesn't matter.
I'm the only girl here? I didn't get tricked into coming here so I get naked in front of a bunch of guys, right?
Only guys? That means I'll have to try extra hard! It would be too uncomfortable to be the only naked girl in this place.
What if Scuttle Town is in danger while I'm stuck here playing this game? I'd never forgive myself.
Some Guardian Genie I am... playing a Strip Poker game while Scuttle Town is unprotected.
Mmm... I can feel the tension leaving my body.
Dancing helps me when I'm fighting monsters. Surely it'll help me here too.
This is only a stripping game. If I lose I just have to take off my clothes... Just...
Not even when I'm fighting a boss do I dance this seriously.
Which type of dance do you like the most, ~player~?
It's okay if you want to look at me dancing. It actually helps me feel empowered.
Now that I'm not wearing pants, I can show you some new moves.
Mmm, dancing like this is not as bad as I thought it would be.
Is it too obvious this is my first time dancing naked? In public, at least.
If I feel this comfortable dancing naked, maybe losing wouldn't be the end of the world.
I miss my friends... Sky is probably feeding her birds at this hour. That reminds me... Didn't she ask me to buy her more bird seed?
I miss my friends... Uncle Mimic is probably wondering where I am at this hour. Either that, or he's nose deep into some new invention.
I miss my friends... It's been a couple of hours now since I last heard Bolo say something dumb. It feels weird...
I miss my friends... I thought maybe Rotty would follow me in here, but she isn't around. I'm worried something might've happened to her.
I miss my friends... I even miss Risky. I know she's not my friend, but maybe someday... Hopefully... If she changes her ways.
I decided if I win the game I'll make sure to pay Sky for the money she lent me that one time. If I don't win I'll still pay her, but another time.
I decided if I win the game I'll buy Uncle Mimic a new hammer in compensation for the one I broke when I accidentally hit Bolo's head.
I decided if I win the game I'll invite Bolo to lunch. Not a day in which he's particularly hungry, of course. I don't have that kind of money.
I decided if I win the game I'll let Rotty tell me that dirty joke she wanted me to hear that one time. It can't be that bad, right?
I decided if I win the game I'll invite Risky to my next birthday party. She probably will say no, but I guess there's nothing to lose.
This is gonna be harder now that I'm not decent anymore, but I'll try...
Wasn't this game hard enough while I was properly dressed? How am I going to concentrate now?
I can't help but feel that Uncle Mimic would be very disappointed in me right now...
My arms feel so naked without my wrist guards. Hmmm, I hope this is the biggest problem I'll have this game.
Without my wrist guards, my look isn't complete anymore. I feel as if I had a shirt put on backwards.
Good thing I accidentally transformed into a monkey and not an elephant. Oh yeah, I can turn into an elephant too.
If I'd transformed into an elephant instead of a monkey, I could have crushed someone. I should be more careful with my powers.
Now that you've seen my entire body, I should feel more relaxed... But I don't. Let's give it time...
Thank you all for being so nice. You make me getting naked in front of strangers a lot easier than it sounds.
You know... This hasn't been as tough as I thought it was gonna be. Maybe the dancing helped me.
I haven't lost a single round yet! Uh-oh... Did I just jinx myself?
Hey, I still haven't lost a single round! Are you really fine with me not taking anything off?
Guess who hasn't lost in a while? Shantae! And that's me!
I came here knowing nothing about poker, and now I'm on a roll! I'm not trying to rub it in, I'm just proud of myself.
It's been a while since I lost a round. Which is great! I just wish my luck had been this good when I was still wearing pants.
I've been winning non stop lately. It maybe feels longer because, you know, I'm not wearing pants. And there's that cool breeze...
I'm having a great winning streak! Celebratory dance!
I can't stop winning! That sucks... For you, I mean! In case you want to see more of me. I don't care...
Even though I'm naked, I'm still having fun! It's not because I'm naked, though.
Isn't this game fun? Being naked doesn't really lessen my enjoyment.
Now that I've had time to get comfortable, I wonder what the big deal with being naked is? It just feels natural, right?
Let's continue playing! Man, I can't believe I didn't finish last. And I can still win!
I hope nobody was expecting me to have long hair down there too. That would be really bizarre.
"Oh, Shantae doesn't have magical hair between her legs, har har..." Yeah, shut up...
I'm sure you'd be great at it, Jura. You certainly got the hips for it, at the very least.
Oh, half-genie means my mom is a genie, and my dad is human. I guess you can call me half-human if that sounds better.
What are you talking about? I think you have the wrong idea about me, Revy. I'm PG-13 at most...
Oh yeah, very hot. But I like it. I'm not much of a fan of the cold weather.
It's not easy to take care of this hair, but I gotta do it. I'd be in trouble if something happens to it, and I gotta fight.
Magic? Not much! Just transform into different creatures when I dance, shooting fire, lighting, etc. Also, whip my hair. Not that I plan on using it here, so don't worry.
Oh, any music is fine. I guess I do prefer the more upbeat kind. It makes me want to jump around, and whip monsters away with my hair!
How I learned to dance... I've always had a knack for it. I guess I'm just a natural. Oh, sorry! I didn't mean to brag.
Why do I have to wear underwear all the time? It's not like I have to strip in public every day, so...
Me? Oh, not really. But I'm not the one with the craziest look. Or maybe I am... Hmm...
That's me! Well... half-genie, actually.
I'm cute? Heheh, thank you! I don't think I hear that very often. People usually call me "tomboy" or "meddling brat".
Learning to dance is not hard. First you just start moving... and then you start moving a different way, and...
Let's do it, Amy! That'd actually help me.
Any outfit can be used for dancing... If you dance while wearing it.
Schtick? I'm an actual half-genie! I can transform into an elephant and jump on top of you. But I won't do it, because I don't feel like it.
You heard about me? But I'm not that famous... am I?
What kind of tournament? I'll be checking my mailbox to see if I get an invitation! Wait, I don't have a mailbox...
Really? Cause you sound familiar to me to! Why don't you say "I'm Ret-2-Go!"?
Magical girl? Me? Well, I'm magical, and I'm a girl, so I guess that's right!
That's okay. I'm always moving anyway, so...
It's kind of a long story. My mom is a genie, so I have magic powers. Aaaaaand, that's all there is.
You can feel that, Galatea? Or can you just me fidgeting all the time?
Well, I'm half-genie, so I guess my bottom half is human. Heheh, just kidding!
I think so too, ~name~. I kinda wish I was at the Dance Parlor instead right now...
It sure is, Futaba! And you don't even know what magical hair is like...
Yeah! I can use magic, Futaba. But I can't do it now. That wouldn't be professional.
Actually I'm a half-genie. So... the kind that can grant reasonable requests that are within my limitations.
I didn't come here to strip, I wanna win. Are you saying that because this is my first game?
Oh, am I supposed to top it? I-I guess I'll try...
Aren't you supposed to rub me before you get three wishes... I mean my lamp, not me! Either way, I'm only half-genie. Please, don't rub me...
Is something wrong, Komi? You look a little overwhelmed.
Oh, I didn't come here to dance... But that's not a bad idea.
Really? You hair seems very normal to me.
I can't grant wishes. But why do you ask? Is there something you want?
If you want me to dance naked, stop being so pushy, Chazz.
Alabasta? No, I'm from Scuttle Town. But I don't think my outfit is that uncommon, right?
Oh, I'm not worried, Nami. I've gotten a lot better at dancing lately. Nowadays that only happens like 10% of the time.
I know, Nami... But it just doesn't seem fair. I'd rather embarrass myself than upset the other players.
Oh no, I'm not evil at all! Which I know is exactly what an evil genie would say, but I swear it's true.
Why am I so bad at this game? Is it because I'm only a half-genie?
I'm sure if I was a full genie I wouldn't suck so much...
Hey, but I thought having two cards with the same number or letter is good, right? That's like the one thing I know about this game.
Isn't it a good thing when you have two cards with the same character? Oh, yours was just better...
Hey, but I had so many cards with the same character! Well, two of each...
I lost? But three cards with the same character is still better than two, right?
I have to strip already? I haven't even said my name. It's Shantae, in case you're interested.
This just started and I have to strip? Do you want to know my name first, or do you just want to see me undress? I'm Shantae...
Oh... There goes my slight suspicion that I was a secret poker genius.
Oh, man... I guess I can't leave without taking anything off after all.
Oh, boy... I do have to get completely naked, after all.
I'm not happy that I lost. But this at least gives me something to do after standing still for such a long time.
Oh, it seems my beginner's luck is over.
It's been a while since I lost. Overall I'm doing pretty well, aren't I?
Did I get too cocky because I haven't lost in a while?
Is this karma because of my arrogance? I'm sorry...
Why is everybody looking at me? Oh, I lost? Okay... I guess I'll remove something.
Who loses this round? Me? Oh, man... Well, here I go.
Who lost? ...It's me, isn't it? Okay!
This wouldn't happen if we were playing a game I'm good at. Like... Umm...
So close. Maybe... I'm not sure.
I don't think I can lose if I... Oh, I lost. Never mind, then.
Ummm, I didn't want to say this, but I don't wear panties under these pants. Now I can tell you because you'll see in a second.
If I have a choice, I'd rather take off my pants first. But I don't wear panties...
Okay, I guess I'll take off my pants, and continue playing in my panties... Oh, right. I don't wear panties...
Nghh, am I really so bad that I can't even hold on to a single piece of clothing?
There go my expectations of not removing every piece of clothing I have...
Well... If I have to get naked anyway, I might as well make it sexy.
I've met ancient evil monsters that are nicer than you, Revy. But I guess it makes sense, since they couldn't speak. They just tried to kill me.
Well, I can shoot fire, summon thunder... You know, the usual spells you can buy at any town shop.
Hmmmm...
Bury your face, Amy? Like on the ground? Don't do that! You won't be able to breathe.
Am I exotic? I guess it's hard to stand out here. There's so many unique people.
I can transform when I dance, but now I'm just doing it so I don't get nervous. Well, too nervous.
Really? So there are ugly genies too... I wonder if I got my looks from my genie mom or my human dad...
Chair person...? (Does she let people sit on her?)
I'm not dancing just for you. Anyone can look at me, b-but only if they want to...
Nobody minds if I dance while taking these off, right? It's just that dancing relaxes me, believe it or not.
I won't be kicked out if I dance while stripping, right? I'd rather mix something I'm not used to doing in public with something I'm familiar with.
It's not a problem if I sway while I take these off, right? I just feel more comfortable if I don't stay put in stressful situations.
Kinda hard to dance while removing your shoes. But I can... Huh...?! Eek, eek...
How do I remove my shoes while dancing? If I do it like... Oh, but that's...! Eek, eek...
Removing my shoes while dancing is a challenge, but I guess I can... Eh...?! Eek, eek...
I'll just slide them down slowly... Maybe I should've faced the other way.
If I'd known I would be playing a Strip Poker game today, of course I'd have put on underwear! Oh, but I don't own any...
I'm just gonna bend over and pull these down... Nothing to see here.
Let me just get this top off, and... done. I don't know how I could handle this without moving my body.
Time to get this top off. Sometimes it's a handful... Oh no, it came off already, heheh...
I gotta see if I can make this interesting. This top opens in the front so... Here it is.
Oh yeah! I can transform too when I dance. But I better not do it now. I don't wanna freak anyone out.
Your voice... It's very pretty, Amy.
Of course, Amy! How about this: ♫ Mmmmmm mmm mmmm... ♫
I'm not into the attention. I mean, it's not the worst part of this whole thing, but still...
I didn't do that on purpose, but at least there's your proof, Jessie.
Shows? No, I have a stable job as a Guardian Genie. What shows are you talking about?
You can still dance if you want. But yeah, that dress is not ideal. I'd probably step on it if I tried to dance in it.
Sure, Akko! Lesson 1: Don't do what I just did, heheh. Wow, I think I can actually make a good teacher.
I didn't know this was strip poker, so I didn't come "prepared". I guess I was just lucky for once.
Half-genie, but full-awesome! D-did that sound cool?
Dancing with someone on top of you must be tough, Futaba.
I can't teach you how to transform unless you're half-genie too, Futaba. But if you want to learn how to dance, I'm your gal!
You're forgiven, Natsuki! What did you say? See? I already forgot. (What did she say?)
I know that look on your face, Komi. It means you want to dance. Either that, or you're hungry.
Thank you, Chazz. It seems you can be sweet if you feel like it.
Hey, I was trying to be nice to you, Chazz! I'm not showing you anything. Close your eyes.
If you learn from me, then you'll be the one that can teach your friend, Nami.
Devil Fruit? I've eaten a lot of weird looking fruit, but no... This ability is just mine, though it seems I can't control it very well when I'm distressed.
My pants are transparent? But they not that transparent, right?
No, this is a first for me, Nami. But I gotta say, I'm enjoying it a lot more than I thought I would.
I can do some basic spells, but that has nothing to do with my dancing. My dances are only for transforming!
Why did I have to be the first one to get naked? I don't particularly enjoy the attention...
I'm the first one naked, which means you'll all be looking at my... I hope I can endure this.
Dancing calms me down even in the middle of a fight. Of course it can help me here too.
This is nothing compared to the situations I usually face. If only I can keep dancing, I can handle it.
It's not that I'm hyperactive, I just like to add dancing to everything I do. So you just sit back and... enjoy the show, I guess.
Hahah, I accidentally did my monkey dance and transformed. I hope I didn't scare anyone.
Oops, that was my monkey dance. I didn't mean to transform. It happens more often than you'd think, heheh...
Uh... That was me turning into a monkey. Did I mention I can transform when I dance. Sorry, I'll be more careful from now on.
Whoops, I didn't mean to do that. I guess I'm so unfamiliar with the whole "stripping while dancing" routine that I accidentally did my monkey transformation.
Sorry. I usually yell "TRAAAANSFORM!" when I do that, so I understand if it caught you off guard. But this time it was an accident.
Hmmm... Oh, I guess I shouldn't cover myself. That wouldn't be fair to everyone else.
I should stay positive... Now I'll be able to move better without my pants, right?
Don't think this isn't embarrassing for me just because I always have my midriff exposed. This is on a completely different level.
It's good to know that dancing can give me so much confidence. But I don't plan on making a career as a stripper, even if I get fired again.
Oh, right... I shouldn't cover myself. Well, I guess this is it for me stripping... What do you think?
I'm not gonna lie, knowing everybody is looking at me dancing, even in these conditions, doesn't feel bad at all.
You have a tail! How cute! Does it move if you're pet?
An actual living angel! I shouldn't be surprised they exist. I'm sure some people don't believe in genies, either.
So how high can you fly with those wings, Pit? I can go really high if I transform into a harpy.
Oh, that's sweet. Give her a hand, Chun-Li!
Monster? Where? I'll whip 'em good!
Are you a sailor, Nami? I have a feeling you spend a lot of time at sea.

state.text: Oh, look. It's the lowly pirate's turn again. You should strip yourself of all your lies and deceit.

case.state: So you can use magic even if you're not a genie? I hope you use it for good.
You have some cool powers, Akko. I hope you don't try stealing my job, hahaha... Hmmm...
So you're saying your name is also Shantae? And you're dressed just like me. Well, they say imitation is the best form of flattery. And only a little creepy.
A pirate, huh? You might have a different style compared to the ones I've met, but I still won't let you fool me.
Classic pirate, dressing provocatively in order to manipulate dimwits. I can almost see Bolo drooling over her...
You look pretty young for a witch. Unless... you're actually an old hag and you used magic to appear young! Gasp!
